AI Description: F-seq is a Python package that provides tools for peak calling and peak detection in functional genomics datasets, specifically ChIP-seq and DNase-seq data. It is designed to identify enriched regions in the genome that represent potential binding sites of proteins or other functional elements.
Core Features: Peak Calling In Chip-Seq & DNAse-Seq Data, Identification Of Enriched Regions In The Genome, Analysis Of Potential Binding Sites Of Proteins Or Functional Elements
General Tags: Genomics, Peak Calling, Functional Genomics, Python Package
